1: <sup>1</sup> Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.
2: <sup>2</sup> Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
3: <sup>3</sup> Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.
4: <sup>4</sup> Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.
5: <sup>5</sup> Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.
6: <sup>6</sup> He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.
7: <sup>7</sup> Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:
8: <sup>8</sup> Fire, and hail; snow, and vapours; stormy wind fulfilling his word:
9: <sup>9</sup> Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:
10: <sup>10</sup> Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:
11: <sup>11</sup> Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:
12: <sup>12</sup> Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:
13: <sup>13</sup> Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
14: <sup>14</sup> He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.
